title: Must. Fight. Cold.
body:
A seasonal cold is trying to ravish my impenetrable immune system. I will win.

I have to win.

I don't have any sick time.

Damn you, Alan Alda. Damn you to hell!
author: Dan

comments.author: Grey Hodge
comments.body: Yeah, your boss would probably make you work sick. At least he can't fire you!

comments.author: Andy
comments.body: You got your cold from Alan Alda?

comments.author: nicki
comments.body:
yeah, my grandma is making me sickly too :(

not fun.

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: just drink gallons of red bull. that'll get you over the hump.

comments.author: Stephanie
comments.body:
One word: Zicam.

That stuff is amazing.

comments.author: nicole
comments.body: "He can't fire you." But SHE could. Mwhahahahaha.

comments.author: Grey Hodge
comments.body: And then SHE would have to work twice as much to pay off the debt. I don't think SHE wants that. I think right about now she's sprinting to get him any remedy she can think of so he'll get back to work. ;)

comments.author: erin
comments.body:
dan. guess what im snackin on?


pistachios!
oh yum.

comments.author: brian of moore
comments.body: talk about sick and delirious... i woke up at 3am.. pink floyd playing on winamp... for a moment i thought that i was roger waters... the confusion passed soon after.. so i got up and took some amoxicillin... i think that stuff is losing its effect though..... :-(

comments.author: evilvet
comments.body: Perhaps you should self-medicate with Moxie-cillin.

comments.author: mish
comments.body:
zicam. that stuff is amazing i hear.

my moms always says i should take it, but theres no way im shoving something up my nose and squirting gel into it.

comments.author: Amanda
comments.body: My favorite cure will take all afternoon...go for a long run, come home and take a super hot shower and then fall asleep and don't set an alarm...
